function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of comprehensive pandemic-sustainable indicators","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on current state rather than future states","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calculation of gap levels for pandemic-sustainable indicators","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on previous research and literature review may result in outdated or incomplete information about pandemic indicators and risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on internationally recognized sustainability systems may not fully address pandemic-specific indicators and risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gap analysis may not capture all pandemic-related sustainability factors, leading to incomplete assessment of building certification systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different building codes and systems of sustainability assessments in different countries may lead to inconsistencies and lack of standardization in pandemic-sustainable criteria for residential buildings.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of a complete system to measure building readiness responding to pandemics may result in incomplete or ineffective preparedness for future pandemics.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imbalance in pandemic response indicators among different gbc&rss may result in limited options for residential buildings to address specific pandemic-related challenges.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments due to lack of sustainable practices and certifications","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in importance of residential sustainability due to predicted increase in zoonotic diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate shading and ventilation in urban green spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of
